metadata.title: CVE-2021-27347 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Use after free in lzma_decompress_buf function in stream.c in Irzip 0.631allows attackers to cause Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted compressedfile.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-27347` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lrzip - 0.651-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lrzip package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.651-2').
